The bodies of Gondorian warriors slain by the Corsair forces can be found at the battleground.\n\nYou should cover the bodies with soil and pay your respects.

Listen to the conversation between Erchar and Herion.
Erchar and Herion meet at the battleground.\n\nYou should speak to Erchar.
<rgb=#FF0000>Kneel</rgb> before the brave warrior to pay your respects
Covered fallen warriors in soil ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

'Erchar does not see the greatness that we have accomplished, only the loss. Do not mistake my words, for I too am saddened by the difficulty of our enemy and the lives they have taken. What I ask for is hope from my brothers to get through this dawn-less day.'

'Herion is stubborn and cannot see that I have made a mistake in riding west into the enemy. This is not a decision I wish to make again be it rash or wise.\n\n'Come. Let us return to Linhir where I shall apologize to Garvir for my absence and for Herion's.'
Covered fallen warrior in soil ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'You have made your way to this place of grief with Herion and I thank you for reuniting us for the return to Linhir.'
